title: a good serif choice to pair with DIN Pro Regular
content: Hi everyone, I'm trying to decide on a good serif to pair with DinPro Regular. This serif would be used as menu/header on an interactive website. If anyone has any good suggestions it would sure be appreciated!
author: Jeremiah

comments.content:
I paired it with Minion a while back. Worked simply.

RIT's student produced magazine uses DIN with PMN Caecilia. It's ok, but not the best.

I think something like Melior would be a nicer and more interesting pairing.
